DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. The date (and time) on which the result is reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS so that it's precision can not be more precise than seconds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
